ComicInfo.Title: In Search of Peter Pan Chapter 5; The Man From the Ciguri Chapter 8; The Birthday; The Terrible Chain Gang; Brain Surgery Made Easy
ComicInfo.Summary: In chapter 8 of "The Man from the Ciguri," Moebius' all-new sequel to The Airtight Garage, the Major embarks on a quest while Batmagoo loses his shirt. Also, Cosey's "In Search of Peter Pan" continues amidst ominous glacial rumblings; a nasty surprise lurks in the short story "The Birthday," by Cossu and Jamsin; and David Lynch's "The Angriest Dog in the World" teaches a new dog some old tricks. Cover painting by Rafael Kayanan. Story Titles The Angriest Dog in the World In Search of Peter Pan Chapter 5 The Man From the Ciguri Chapter 8 The Birthday The Terrible Chain Gang Brain Surgery Made Easy Post-Apocalypse!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 21:42:03. [CVDB36217] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 08:03:29. [Issue ID 51847]
